AbnExperiment.name: AbnExperiment
AbnExperiment.description: Represents an A/B/n experiment that's used with Marketing Cloud Next content, Experience Cloud websites, and platform automations.

DataSpaceId.description: Unique identifier that refers to the data space where an experiment's resources originate. Required.

Description.description: Text description of the experiment. Optional.

DeveloperName.description: System or user-generated API name for the experiment. Required.

LastAnalyzed.description: Time and date of last analysis.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp that indicates the last time an experiment was referenced by another resource.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp that indicates the last time a user viewed the experiment.

Name.description: Text label that identifies the experiment. Required.

PersonalizationSchemaEnum.description: Picklist value that indicates the type of personalization schema, which is related to where a personalization decision is created.

PersonalizationSchemaId.description: Unique identifier that refers to the schema that’s related to the experiment.

PrimaryMetricId.description: Unique identifier that refers to engagement signal metrics, which are used to measure an experiment.

ProfileDataGraphId.description: Unique identifier that refers to the profile data graph that’s used.

ScheduleFrequencyInMinutes.description: Number of minutes that defines when personalized content can be made available.

Source.description: Indicates where the experiment was created.

SourceRecordId.description: Unique identifier that refers to the specific record that contains the experiment.

StartedDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the experiment began or is scheduled to begin.

State.description: Picklist value that indicates the current state of the experiment.

Status.description: Picklist value that indicates the current status of the experiment while an action is being performed.

StoppedDate.description: Timestamp that indicates when the experiment ended or is scheduled to end.
